---
title: "Fast distance between points"
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
---

```{r message=FALSE}
library("sf")
library("Rfast")
set.seed(1)
```

```{r}
bbox = st_bbox(c(xmin = 0, xmax = 1, ymax = 0, ymin = 1))
bbox = st_as_sfc(bbox)
n = 8000
pts = st_sample(bbox, n)
```

```{r}
system.time({
  m1 = st_distance(pts, which = "Euclidean")
})
```

```{r}
system.time({
  df = st_coordinates(pts)
  m2 = Rfast::Dist(df, method = "euclidean")
})
```
```{r}
all(m1 == m2)
```

```{r}
m1[1:5, 1:5]
```
